input.sentences: my brother had his wedding last week .
he looked so happy with his new wife !
we had so many people attend the reception .
we all talked and ate and celebrated the wedding .
i was so happy for my brother and wish him and his wife the best !
output.sentences: The dog was ready to go to the park, and when he got there he had a great time playing in the grass. He was very happy, as well as his mom. It was a great day for him.
Last week was my brothers wedding, it was such a beautiful day.
Everyone was cheering for him, and took lots of pictures.
There was so many poeple that showed up, that we were worried there wasnt enough food.
The night ended off on a great note, everyone had a great time.
